attributes.action: Referendum of no confidence in Parliament & the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: After the announcement of pedophile rings linked to the UK government on every level of the judiciary, military, commons and lords it is apparent that there is a dark conspiracy to hide the truth regarding child abuse within the UK government. I therefore propose a referendum of the people to vote on the issue of no confidence against the house of commons and house of lords as we are unable to ascertain whether or not any of those who represent the people are of good character.
